items.badge_description: We love lagers! Crisp, clean, cold fermenting, these beers are a labor of love. Whether a dark Dunkel, a malty amber, or a light helles, lagers never fail us. So on Lager Day, join us in a toast to the humble lager.

items.badge_description: Fresh from the tap is one of the best ways to enjoy a beer. Just try to use a glass and not drink directly from the tap, as tempting as it may be. That's 105 checkins with the serving style of Draft. Try 5 more for Level 22!

items.badge_description: While a pint of traditional English ale will always remain a staple, the craft beer scene in England, much like the rest of the world, has continued to grow at a rapid rate! That's 245 different beers from a brewery from England! Try 5 more for Level 50!

items.badge_description: Your quest to quench your thirst leaves no stone unturned! That's at least 40 distinct venues!

Wine isn't the only beverage worthy of pairing with a delicious meal. With so many styles widely available, there’s a perfect pint for any cuisine of your choosing. That's a beer at 10 different venues categorized as a Restaurant. Try 5 more for Level 3!
Had enough tea and biscuits? Head to the pub for a pint! That's at least 140 beers from the UK. Try 5 more for Level 29.

items.badge_description: Light and crisp, a Pilsner is all you need to make your day great. Though, perhaps another one would make it even better. That’s 265 different Pilsners. Try 5 more for Level 54!

items.badge_description: The power of pilsner! Part of our first round of “Super Style” badges in 2023, celebrate this crisp, clean lager, which ranked as the 10th most checked-in style of 2021 with over 1M check-ins. AVAILABLE ONLY TO UNTAPPD INSIDERS.

items.badge_description: While spontaneity can be fun, sometimes you want to make sure your adventure will rock. Checkout the menu at an Untappd Verified Venue before visiting and know exactly what’s on tap! That's 330 check-ins at venue that is verified.  Try 5 more for Level 67!
